title: VOLTAGE ARC | They Always Shout At Me (Playthrough Video)
description:
Roh, wild und voller Energie! Voltage Arc spielt «They Always Shout At Me» – direkt aus ihrem Bandraum.

«They Always Shout At Me» handelt von Vorurteilen und dem Zwang, in ein Rollenbild passen zu müssen aber auch davon, sich selbst zu sein und gegen Widerstände zu kämpfen.

---

Der Song ist auf unserer neuester EP «Rebels» zu hören. Wenn du uns unterstützen möchtest, überleg dir doch, eine physischen CD aus unserem Online-Shop zu bestellen:
https://www.voltagearc.com/shop/va-p-10

Rebels ist zudem auf allen grossen Streaming-Plattformen verfügbar:
► Amazon: http://bit.ly/voltagearc_rebels_amazon
► SMStracks: http://bit.ly/voltagearc_rebels_smstracks

title: VOLTAGE ARC | Upside Down (Official Music Video)
description:
There's a light at the end of every tunnel and it's only you, who holds the steering wheel of your own life. So now it's time to turn your life UPSIDE DOWN!

---

Voltage Arc, the aspiring hard rock band from Switzerland, present their newest single «Upside Down». A positive message, wrapped in a song to sing along – amazingly visualised in this music video by Fabio Chiantera and Miró Haller.

---

http://www.voltagearc.com | http://www.facebook.com/voltagearc | http://www.instagram.com/voltage_arc | http://bit.ly/voltagearc_spotify

title: VOLTAGE ARC | Hard Rock Hotspot (Official Music Video)
description:
Voltage Arc heizen nochmals richtig ein. Mit ihrer Single «Hard Rock Hotspot» liefert die junge, enthusiastische Schweizer Band einen weiteren Einblick in ihre bevorstehende EP «Rebels», welche am 11.06.2021 veröffentlicht wird.

---

Verzerrte Gitarren, dreckige Vocals und explosive Drums sorgen für energievollen Hard Rock – stay tuned.

---

title: VOLTAGE ARC | For Rock and Roll (Official Music Video)
description:
Voltage Arc präsentieren ihre erste Single «For Rock and Roll»! 

Wie der Name schon andeutet, steht «For Rock and Roll» dafür, den Hardrock-Lifestyle voll auszuleben. Erlebe Voltage Arc bei ihrem Live-Auftritt im Juni 2018, nur einen Tag nach der Fertigstellung der Audioaufnahmen für denselben Song. Der Gig fand in der regionalen Location «TaB Reinach» statt und wurde komplett von Voltage Arc selbst organisiert.

http://www.voltagearc.com | http://www.facebook.com/voltagearc | http://www.instagram.com/voltage_arc | http://bit.ly/voltagearc_spotify

#VoltageArc #HardRock #HeavyRock

title: VOLTAGE ARC | They Always Shout At Me (Playthrough Video)
description:
Raw, wild and full of energy! Watch Voltage Arc play «They Always Shout At Me» straight from their band room.

«They Always Shout At Me» is about stereotypes, the force of having to fit into a role model, beeing yourself and fighting resistance.

---

The song is featured on our newest EP «Rebels». If you want to support us, consider buying a physical copy from our online store:
https://www.voltagearc.com/en/shop/va-p-10

Rebels is also available on all major streaming platforms:

title: VOLTAGE ARC | Hard Rock Hotspot (Official Music Video)
description:
It’s getting hot! With their newest release «Hard Rock Hotspot», Voltage Arc—the young, enthusiastic Band from Switzerland—gives more insight into their upcoming EP «Rebels», which will see the light of day on 11th June 2021.

---

Distorted Guitars, powerful vocals and explosive drums is what forms the energetic music by Voltage Arc–stay tuned for more!

---

title: VOLTAGE ARC | For Rock and Roll (Official Music Video)
description:
Voltage Arc present their first Single «For Rock and Roll»! 

As the name claims, «For Rock and Roll» stands for living the hard rock lifestyle to the fullest. Experience Voltage Arc during their life performance in June 2018, only one day after completing the audio recordings for the same song. The gig held place in the regional venue "TaB Reinach" and was completely organised by Voltage Arc themself.

http://www.voltagearc.com | http://www.facebook.com/voltagearc | http://www.instagram.com/voltage_arc | http://bit.ly/voltagearc_spotify

#VoltageArc #HardRock #HeavyRock
